transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Haan ji sir, Mallika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji madam.
Executive: Ji sir time hai abhi?
Customer: Madam main thoda bahar aa raha hu khatra. Ye phone mere paas hi hai aaj.
Executive: Accha sir to aap mujhe bata do ki main kis time pe connect karu aapko?
Customer: Madam main aadhe ghante mein pahunch jaunga main.
Executive: Main fir aapko na 3 baje ke baad 3 baje isliye kyunki mera 2 se 3 mera lunch hota hai to main 3 baje ke baad connect kar paungi aapko.
Customer: Theek theek hai theek hai theek hai madam.
Executive: Theek hai ji main 3 baje ke baad connect kar time de payenge 3 baje ke baad?
Customer: Haan haan main de dunga us time pe time madam aapko.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai koi dikkat nahi theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai 3 baje tak.
Customer: Rakhta hu madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is busy and cannot talk right now.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back at 3 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- callback, time, schedule
